parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent loss of power steering can cause difficulty in steering, especially at low speeds, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: power steering fluid levels are full.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump can cause a complete loss of power steering, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: power steering pump needs to be replaced

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering gear can cause difficulty in steering, especially at low speeds, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
The failure of the ignition module can cause the vehicle to stall sporadically and without warning, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle stalls sporadically and without warning

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlight wiring harness can cause the headlights to malfunction or fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: difficulty replacing bulbs due to complex procedure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure or melting of the headlight socket can cause the headlights to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: headlights do not turn on when unlocking the car
